About Us: Aurora and Son is a hauling company that specializes in moving vehicles across the East Coast with great care and professionalism.
Founded by Fernando Trigoso with 35+ years of trucking and driving experience, this is a family owned and operated hauling company and is based out of Tampa, Florida.
At Aurora and Son, we take pride in our work and it reflects in our service and customer experience.

Commercial Vehicle Hauling.top-level: With Commercial Vehicle Hauling, we can ensure your company or dealership vehicles are taken care of throughout shipping and loading.
Commercial Vehicle Hauling.breakdown: This service includes trucks and cars for your company or dealership scheduled ahead of time and with reliable delivery.

Personal Vehicle Hauling.top-level: With Personal Vehicle Hauling, we can ensure your personal property expertly cared for.
Personal Vehicle Hauling.breakdown: This service includes trucks and cars. With personal property inspections before loading and during delivery, ensuring your personal vehicle is maintained in its condition.
